products.title: Dessert Bars Happiness Box
Rolled Oats 1kg Pouch
products.body_html:
Rolled Gold

Freshly-harvested, single-origin, the most premium, rolled golden oats all the way from sunny Australia. Oats really doesn't get any better than this. Just try!

None of the bad stuff

Unlike the competition, we use no preservatives, no maltodextrin, nothing artificial. Just whole grains - all 100% natural Oats from Sunny Australia.

Happy, healthy hearts

It's incredible what genuine and fresh ingredients can do with a little bit of love. You "oat" to try this!

We are natural

The ingredients are 100% natural. The flavours are 100% natural. The taste is 100% natural. Because that’s just the way it should be.

We are generous

Our products are stuffed with nutrients, with all the ingredients that’s good for you, in all the quantities that’s right for you.

We are yummy

If you think healthy can’t be absolutely delicious, do we have a surprise for you. Take a bite and savour the yum. You’ll love it.

We are clean

No gluten. No processed sugar. No preservatives. No chemicals. No artificial anything. Just good, clean food. That’s a promise.

Oat-rageously great!

It’s rolled. It’s gold. Great for your heart. Great for weight management. It’s naturally delicious, plus the goodness of chocolate. You’ll never have regular oats again.

What goes in:

  • 4.9g protein per serving
  • 100% whole grains
  • Packed with omega - 3
  • Rich in antioxidants

What stays out:

  • Vegetable oil

  • Artificial sweeteners

gold.

Happy healthy
hearts.

Zero fillers.

products.title: Tulsi Giloy Juice
products.body_html:
Tulsi Powered Immunity

We only harvest fresh-cut leaves of wild Tulsi for our juices. Why? It ensures no urban pollutants sneak in and the most nutrients are retained.

Giloy Goodness

We strip the hard bark off the mature stem of Neem-grown Giloy plants to reveal its rich green goodness. It has more alkaloid content which has anti-allergic properties.

Health From Head To Toe

All-round wellness starts right here. From helping your skin to fighting allergies and boosting your immunity, this juice does it all.

For centuries this juice has helped boost immune systems and fight disease. Following the Ayurvedic process, the mixture is soaked overnight with 8 times the water and then boiled until it reduces to 1/4th of the volume.

Control Your Blood Sugar

Neem Giloy and Tulsi act as hypoglycemic agents. They help control your blood sugar.

Reduce Your Allergies

Both Tulsi and Giloy are proven to reduce allergy attacks. Stop the sneeze and enjoy every breath of fresh air.

Nutritional
Facts*

(30ml)
per serving
Energy 3 kCal
Total Fat 0g
Carbohydrate 0.6g
Protein 0.1g
Total Sugars 0.1g
Calcium 2.5mg
Iron 0.1mg
Sodium 6.9mg
- Ingredients (Each 100 ml juice is prepared from): Giloy Ras (Tinospora Cordifolia) Steam: 78%, Tulsi Ras (Osimum Sanctum) Whole Plant: 20%, Permitted Class II Preservatives : 0.3%, Citric Acid QS, Base Q.S. - Store in a cool, dry place. Refrigerate once opened.

Ingredients

Tulsi
Giloy

products.title: Karela Jamun Juice
products.body_html:
No Extracts Here

Instead of using Jamun pulp or extract, we use its seeds to make this juice. The mixture is soaked overnight with 8 times the water and then boiled until it reduces to 1/4th of the volume.

Control Cholesterol

This juice is great for your heart, as it helps lower blood sugar levels.

Manage Blood Sugar

Karela’s hypoglycemic properties help regulate sugar while Jamun seeds slow down the process of converting starch into sugar. This helps stop sudden spikes in sugar levels.

Fresh karela and jamun seeds are added to 16 parts water and boiled for 8 hours. Using Vedic principles, we’re able to create a mix that’s perfect for body and soul.

Good For Your Gut

Our unique concoction helps ​​increase the liver’s bile juice secretion. This greatly improves digestion.

Acne? Managed

This magical mix is good inside and out. Dab a cotton swab with the juice onto acne-affected skin and watch it disappear.

products.title: Assorted Energy Bars (Pack of 3 Boxes)
products.body_html:
The healthiest
way to snack.

Made for the travel, the gym, the office snack and everything in-between, our multigrain energy bars are filled with micro and macro nutrients like whole grains, nuts, berries and seeds. Healthy, Yummy, Guilt-free! What's not to love?

What goes in the bar:

  • Our first ingredient is always a nutrient dense ingredient like whole grains, nuts or seeds
  • 25 - 30% Whole grains & complex carbs. We use: Brown rice, Little millet, Foxtail millet, Oats, Buckwheat, Amaranth
  • 10 - 15% Nuts. We use: Almonds, Cashews, Peanuts; All round more protein and fiber
  • 10 - 15% Seeds. We use: Flax, Chia, Sunflower, Sesame, Watermelon, Melon, Pumpkin
  • No Corn Syrup or Artificial Sweeteners and No Hydrogenated Oils.
  • No artificial preservatives: We don't want our bars lasting years on the shelf. We focus on what's important - long term health of our consumers.
More Protein. More Fibre.
Zero rubbish.

We put in all the good stuff and left out all the bad. So the next time you’re hungry, ditch the junk food and dig into something that’shealthy. Thank us later.

You know why unto 30% of our bars are just nuts and seeds? Because they’re nutrient bombs that pack in a lot of nourishment. Andhey, they’re also crunchy!

Variants included: 1- Dark Chocolate & Cranberry, 2- Fruit , Nuts & Seeds, 3- Almond & Quinoa

products.title: Assorted Breakfast Bars (Pack of 2 Boxes)
products.body_html:
The Breakfast when
you skip Breakfast.

Stacked with good-for-you protein, antioxidants, omega 3's and fibre, it's much more than just a quick healthy breakfast bar - it's nutrition and energy to get you going. Pack them in your pocket and get munching on the move!

What each bar contains:

  • 8g of protein, 7g fibre, 10g of whole grain per bar
  • Made from wholesome ingredients like quinoa, oats, millets, almonds, peanuts, flax and chia seed
  • 100% Natural ingredients
  • No preservatives. No artificial ingredients
Easy and Convenient
to carry:

No time for breakfast? No problem! Munch on these while on the move and you can get a full soul-sustaining mix of all the protein and fibre you need.

Nutrition
first

Did we really pack in oats, millets and almonds into a bar? Yes, yes and yes. Did we mention 10g of whole grains? And nuts? And seeds? TL/DR: It's nutritious.

Flavours to
die for.

Some like Apricot Fig. Some dig Apple Cinnamon. Others swear by Blueberry Pie. And then there are the Almond Coconut fans.Which one are you?

Nutritional
Facts*

(50g)
per serving
Energy 229 Kcal %DV
Protein 7.9g 15%
Total Carbs 29.6g 10%
Dietry Fibre 7.0g 29%
Sugars 8.7g
Fat 9.0g 15%
Saturated Fat 2.3g 14%
MUFA 3.1g
PUFA 3.1g 41%
*approx value. %DV based on a 2000 kcal diet. **NetCarbs calculated as (Total Carbs - Fibre). ***alpha linolen c.

Ingredients

Whole grains
Assorted Seeds
Assorted Nuts
Blueberries
Dried apricots and figs
Coconut
Dried Apple slices
Cinnamon

products.title: Assorted Energy Bars (Pack of 2 Boxes)
products.body_html:
The healthiest
way to snack.

Made for the travel, the gym, the office snack and everything in-between, our multigrain energy bars are filled with micro and macro nutrients like whole grains, nuts, berries and seeds. Healthy, Yummy, Guilt-free! What's not to love?

What goes in the bar:

  • Our first ingredient is always a nutrient dense ingredient like whole grains, nuts or seeds
  • 25 - 30% Whole grains & complex carbs. We use: Brown rice, Little millet, Foxtail millet, Oats, Buckwheat, Amaranth
  • 10 - 15% Nuts. We use: Almonds, Cashews, Peanuts; All round more protein and fiber
  • 10 - 15% Seeds. We use: Flax, Chia, Sunflower, Sesame, Watermelon, Melon, Pumpkin
  • No Corn Syrup or Artificial Sweeteners and No Hydrogenated Oils.
  • No artificial preservatives: We don't want our bars lasting years on the shelf. We focus on what's important - long term health of our consumers.
More Protein. More Fibre.
Zero rubbish.

We put in all the good stuff and left out all the bad. So the next time you’re hungry, ditch the junk food and dig into something that’shealthy. Thank us later.

Nuts about nuts.
And seeds

You know why unto 30% of our bars are just nuts and seeds? Because they’re nutrient bombs that pack in a lot of nourishment. Andhey, they’re also crunchy!

Whole lotta whole grains.

Others use refined grains. Not us. We ensure that unto 30% of our bars are loaded with whole grains and complex carbs.Because good is better than easy.

products.title: Assorted Breakfast Bars
products.body_html:
The Breakfast when
you skip Breakfast.

Stacked with good-for-you protein, antioxidants, omega 3's and fibre, it's much more than just a quick healthy breakfast bar - it's nutrition and energy to get you going. Pack them in your pocket and get munching on the move!

What each bar contains:

  • 8g of protein, 7g fibre, 10g of whole grain per bar
  • Made from wholesome ingredients like quinoa, oats, millets, almonds, peanuts, flax and chia seed
  • 100% Natural ingredients
  • No preservatives. No artificial ingredients
Easy and Convenient
to carry:

No time for breakfast? No problem! Munch on these while on the move and you can get a full soul-sustaining mix of all the protein and fibre you need.

Nutrition
first

Did we really pack in oats, millets and almonds into a bar? Yes, yes and yes. Did we mention 10g of whole grains? And nuts? And seeds? TL/DR: It's nutritious.

Flavours to
die for.

Some like Apricot Fig. Some dig Apple Cinnamon. Others swear by Blueberry Pie. And then there are the Almond Coconut fans.Which one are you?

Nutritional
Facts*

(50g)
per serving

products.title: Assorted Energy Bars
products.body_html:
The healthiest
way to snack.

Made for the travel, the gym, the office snack and everything in-between, our multigrain energy bars are filled with micro and macro nutrients like whole grains, nuts, berries and seeds. Healthy, Yummy, Guilt-free! What's not to love?

What goes in the bar:

  • Our first ingredient is always a nutrient dense ingredient like whole grains, nuts or seeds
  • 25 - 30% Whole grains & complex carbs. We use: Brown rice, Little millet, Foxtail millet, Oats, Buckwheat, Amaranth
  • 10 - 15% Nuts. We use: Almonds, Cashews, Peanuts; All round more protein and fiber
  • 10 - 15% Seeds. We use: Flax, Chia, Sunflower, Sesame, Watermelon, Melon, Pumpkin
  • No Corn Syrup or Artificial Sweeteners and No Hydrogenated Oils.
  • No artificial preservatives: We don't want our bars lasting years on the shelf. We focus on what's important - long term health of our consumers.
More Protein. More Fibre.
Zero rubbish.

We put in all the good stuff and left out all the bad. So the next time you’re hungry, ditch the junk food and dig into something that’shealthy. Thank us later.

Nuts about nuts.
And seeds

You know why unto 30% of our bars are just nuts and seeds? Because they’re nutrient bombs that pack in a lot of nourishment. Andhey, they’re also crunchy!

Whole lotta whole grains.

Others use refined grains. Not us. We ensure that unto 30% of our bars are loaded with whole grains and complex carbs.Because good is better than easy.

Facts*
